knimeNode.name: PNGs to Binary Objects
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts the PNGs of a column to binary objects.

fullDescription.intro: This node converts the PNG cells to binary object cells.
fullDescription.option:
Append
Does append the new column to the table.
Replace
Does replace the selected column with the new column.

ports.inPort: Table that contains the PNGs that will be converted.
ports.outPort: Input table with binary object column either appended or replacing the PNGs.
